journal.loadingError: The entries could not be loaded. Please try again later.
journal.emptyState: No entry selected. Please select an entry on the left or create an entry.
journal.loadEntryError: The entry could not be loaded.

details.trackNotFound: The linked track "{link}" could not be found.

tracks.name: Track name
tracks.changeJournalWarning: The track is already used in {count} journal entries. Saving the track will change these entries. You can instead clone the track.
tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.moveFailed: The track could not be moved.

cache.label: Cache tiles
cache.help: Caches tiles locally for 180 days. Needs disk space, makes app less dependent on internet access.

attribution.label: Attribution
attribution.help: Copyright for the map tiles. HTML is possible.

port.label: Port
port.help: For the internal tile server. Requires restart.

git.help: The Git Integration allows to secure the running journal to other computers.

moreInformation.title: More information
moreInformation.header: The Git integration is an advanced feature. Basic knowledge in Git is necessary. Requirements before enabling Git:
moreInformation.directory: The app directory must be a Git repository.
moreInformation.executable: Git must be installed and executable.
moreInformation.pushPull: Push- and Pull-Operations must work without further arguments or prompts (e.g. by using SSH-certificates for authentication).
